display_name: Total number of missed hits (Inhibitory Control/GNG Block)
description:
Component from the Go-No-Go Continuous Performance Task (GNG/CPT), which is a computer-based attention test developed for longitudinal studies of heterogenous samples of children ages 3 to 12 years. The primary test outcome from this test is d prime (d) for the Continuous Performance Test trial block, a signal detectability parameter that assesses the childs ability to correctly identify targets corrected for their response bias (higher is better). [Clark CAC, et al. 2023 (PubMed ID: 36633982)](https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/36633982/)

[Search for all GNG/CPT variables within this dataset](https://sleepdata.org/datasets/pats/variables?search=gngcpt)
